title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.7 - Flood lights
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.7 - Flood lights

State Regulations

Racing associations shall install at their tracks and
maintain flood lights to provide adequate illumination of the track and stable
areas, and such patrol system as may be approved by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4207.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
